GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
fuse: write inode in fuse_release()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 4bd9d5d20f344d015422969302d12653c903c271, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit 36ea23374d1f7b6a9d96a2b61d38830fdf23e45d. For more details please see the references link.
